alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rocky Ford to 9 miles southwest of Higbee to 16 miles northwest of Kim. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Swink, Higbee and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
